meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of mammals.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the mammalian species in the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The furry, warm-blooded creature displayed typical mammalian behavior.
meanings.sent3: The mammalian family reunion was a lively affair with lots of hugs and kisses.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a mammalian embrace.
meanings.sent5: The mammalian features of the animal made it easy to identify as a mammal.

meanings.sent1: The mammalian scurried through the forest in search of food.
meanings.sent2: A mammalian can give birth to live young and nurse them with milk.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous mammalian stole the picnic basket and ran off into the woods.
meanings.sent4: She was as graceful as a mammalian in her movements.
meanings.sent5: The mammalian's fur was soft to the touch, just like a blanket.
